Text: Lewiston, Dakota County, Minnesota:  A town once larger than nearby Northfield; gone in only fifteen years.
Triplets:<Lewiston
3:
--------------------
Text: Lewiston, Dakota County, Minnesota:  but this town set near the Cannon River and Alta Avenue was home to many Minnesotan politicians, such as Edward J. Thye, Minnesota's governor; Pierce Butler became a United States supreme court justice, and Loren W. Collins was a Minnesota supreme court justice.
Triplets:<Lewiston
4:
--------------------
Text: Lewiston, Dakota County, Minnesota:  A flourished town with a horseracing track and a hotel was the home of these political figures.
Triplets:<Lewiston
